title: Cask type taxonomy
description: Reference list of cask structural types (shape/size classes) used in Scotch whisky maturation.

id.description: Stable identifier for the cask type (e.g. cask-type.barrel).

label.description: Human-readable name of the cask type (e.g. Barrel, Hogshead).

aliases.description: Optional list of alternative names and common variants.

lifecycle.description: Catalogue status of this cask type.

category.description: Broad size/usage class for the cask (e.g. small, standard, large).

capacity_l_min.description: Minimum typical capacity in litres for this cask type.

capacity_l_max.description: Maximum typical capacity in litres for this cask type.
